    • Constructor Detail

      • Automaton

        public Automaton​(int ruleNum,
                 Generation initial)
        Constructor to create an Automaton using a provided rule number and an initial Generation.
        Parameters:
        ruleNum - The number corresponding to the Wolfram code of the rule to be used for the Automaton.
        initial - The initial Generation of the Automaton.

      • Automaton

        public Automaton​(java.lang.String fileName)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor to create an Automaton from a given file that follows the following format: rule-number false-symbol true-symbol initial-cell-states
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file used to create the Automaton.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • evolve

        public void evolve​(int numSteps)
        Evolves the latest Generation a given number of times, using a similar method from the Rule class.
        Parameters:
        numSteps - The number of times the Generation is to be evolved.

      • getRuleNum

        public int getRuleNum()
        Getter to return the rule number associated with the Automaton.
        Returns:
        The rule number associated with the Automaton.

      • getGeneration

        public Generation getGeneration​(int stepNum)
        Getter to return the Generation at a given step number.
        Parameters:
        stepNum - The step number of the Generation to be returned.
        Returns:
        The Generation at the given step number.

      • getTotalSteps

        public int getTotalSteps()
        Getter to return the total number of evolutions the Automaton has undergone.
        Returns:
        The total number of steps applied to the Automaton.

      • saveEvolution

        public void saveEvolution​(java.lang.String filename)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Saves a String representation of the Automaton to a file with the given file name.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file the Automaton is to be saved to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • toString

        Returns a String representation of the Automaton, using methods from the Generation class.
